sys_dictionary.default_value: The Directorate-General DIGIT is the Commission department responsible for providing digital services that support other Commission departments and European Institutions in their daily work and that help European public administrations work better together. DIGIT B, in partnership with Commission services and other stakeholders, provides high quality corporate Business Solutions (Information Systems), common frameworks and interoperable, reusable components enabling the successful delivery of the Commission's Digital Transformation and EU policies. Unit DIGIT B 2 â€œSolutions for Legislation, Policy & HR'' provides corporate digital solutions to help European Institutions and other bodies 10 run their administrations and Decision making Process and implement policies in selected areas. The unit works together with the Secretariat General DO HR and the HR Family and others as Partners such as DG GROW on Policy and Administrative Solutions it delivers and operates solution 1&' areas such as corporate decision making, document management, management of human resources and policy implementation.
